member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook.FacebookOptions.Validate
member.summary: Check that the options are valid. Should throw an exception if things are not ok.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook.FacebookOptions.AppId
member.summary: Gets or sets the Facebook-assigned appId.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook.FacebookOptions.AppSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the Facebook-assigned app secret.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook.FacebookOptions.SendAppSecretProof
member.summary: Gets or sets if the appsecret_proof should be generated and sent with Facebook API calls. This is enabled by default.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.Facebook.FacebookOptions.Fields
member.summary: The list of fields to retrieve from the UserInformationEndpoint. https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/user
